descriptionHtml:
Steam updated my SkyrimPrefs.ini to \"low\" settings :(

For better or worse, I remade with my old settings.    For this to work, you need to backup your own skyrimprefs.ini and open both.  Mine and your SkyrimPrefs.ini...find the missing information; iSize H, iSize W, sD3DDevice
set your monitor resolution
name your GPU using the \" \" marks. sD3DDevice=\"video adapter card name\"

Im using 32GB ReadyBoost on SSD, so I use cache to disk.  Freeing up RAM, therefor extend most common things like grass to 2x the range. 4k Shadows. 2x water, high resolution too.  Many tweeks to get the best possible look in skyrim

This could be used as a reference for low-mid range machines, as there are a few tweeks not found in vanilla ini.
author: me
